main event: A UFO sighting was reported on May 3, 1961, involving a triangular object tracked on radar and visually observed.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately the size of a star., The sighted object was noted to have a straight path without any maneuvering or changes in configuration., The sighting was confirmed through both ground radar and visual observation., Initial evaluations suggested various possibilities including a balloon or an astronomical object., The object was deemed unidentified following investigation.
sighted object: triangular object tracked on radar and visually identified
location: Unknown Location, Unknown Region, Unknown Country
witness description: Aircraft navigator who sighted the object while in flight.
